haircut.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a small amount off the normal selling price of a bond, share etc
haircut.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Congress forced depositors to take a mandatory 10 to 15% haircut in order to regulate the industry.
haircut.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a reduction in the budget for a plan, investment etc
haircut.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: By year end, the project had been given three haircuts, and the managers began to worry about its final outcome.
